io.netty.handler.codec.http.router

Class Handler

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.channel.ChannelHandlerAdapter

            • io.netty.handler.codec.http.router.Handler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.netty.channel.ChannelHandler, io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler

    public class Handler
extends DualAbstractHandler<io.netty.channel.ChannelInboundHandler,Router>
    Inbound handler that converts HttpRequest to Routed and passes Routed to the matched handler.
